quotes.quote: You reach a point where you don't work for money.
All happiness depends on courage and work.
Work banishes those three great evils, boredom, vice, and poverty.
Working hard and working smart sometimes can be two different things.
Inspiration is one thing and you can't control it, but hard work is what keeps the ship moving. Good luck means, work hard. Keep up the good work.
Laziness may appear attractive, but work gives satisfaction.
If you love your work, if you enjoy it, you're already a success.
Real success is finding your lifework in the work that you love.
How hard you work matters more than how much you make.
The common denominator for success is work.
We get what we want when we stay focused and do the work.
Don't get discouraged, and think positive all the time. Don't get down on yourself if you lose out a couple of times. It's just a lot of hard work.
Positive work environments outperform negative work environments.
If your dream is a big dream, and if you want your life to work on the high level that you say you do, there's no way around doing the work it takes to get you there.
Work is either fun or drudgery. It depends on your attitude. I like fun.
Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeedâ€”there's so little competition.
A man succeeds in completing a work only when his qualities transcend that work.
A positive attitude is something everyone can work on, and everyone can learn how to employ it.
Work for the fun of it, and the money will arrive some day.
When working on yourself it is a good idea to make sure you are doing it for you first.
Work hard at work worth doing.
If you go to work on your goals, your goals will go to work on you. If you go to work on your plan, your plan will go to work on you. Whatever good things we build end up building us.
Work leads to greater success than nonwork. Hard work leads to greatness.
There is virtue in work and there is virtue in rest. Use both and overlook neither.
The world is full of willing people, some willing to work, the rest willing to let them.
There is a sense that things, if you keep positive and optimistic about what can be done, do work out.
A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes a lot of hard work.
The dictionary is the only place that success comes before work. work is the key to success, and hard work can help you accomplish anything.
Everyone enjoys doing the kind of work for which he is best suited.
If you work just for money, you'll never make it, but if you love what you're doing and you always put the customer first, success will be yours.
